extension.name: JF CameraSlider
extension.author: JoomForest.com
extension.description:
JoomForest - JF Social (Joomla Module)
Name:JF CameraSlider
Version:1.2
Release Date:08.02.13
Description:Pixedelic CameraSlider v1.3.4, Only For "JF Social" Joomla 2.5 Template
NOTE!:This module works only on Joomla 2.5. PLEASE dont forget to read documentation.
Website:http://www.joomforest.com/
Support:http://www.joomforest.com/support.html - Support you can get only on our forum.
Follow US:
  • This Module is base on "Pixedelic" Camera Slider - http://www.pixedelic.com/plugins/camera/
Copyright (C) 2012 JoomForest.com

field.name: jfCameraHeight
field.label: Camera Height
field.description: Type Camera Height (default is - '41%').

field.name: jfCameraFx
field.label: Effects
field.description: Choose Slide Effect (Default is - 'random').

field.name: jfCameraAnimSpeed
field.label: Animation Speed
field.description: Type Animation Speed (default is '1500' = 1.5 seconds).

field.name: jfCameraPauseTime
field.label: Pause Time
field.description: Type Pause Interval (default is '3000' = 3 seconds).

field.name: jfCameraBoxCols
field.label: Box Cols Animations
field.description: Type Box Cols Animation Count (default is = '6').

field.name: jfCameraBoxRows
field.label: Box Rows Animations
field.description: Type Box Rows Animation Count (default is = '4').

field.name: jfCameraEasing
field.label: Easing
field.description: Choose Slide Easing (Default is - 'easeInOutExpo').

field.name: jfCameraLoader
field.label: Loader Type
field.description: Choose Loader Type

field.name: jfCameraLoaderColor
field.label: Loader Color
field.description: Choouse Loader Color Style (default is black = #eeeeee)

field.name: jfCameraLoaderBGColor
field.label: Loader Background Color
field.description: Choouse Loader Background Color Style (default is black = #222222)

field.name: jfCameraPieDiameter
field.label: Pie Diameter
field.description: Type Pie Diameter (default is = '38').

field.name: jfCameraPiePosition
field.label: Pie Position
field.description: Choose Pie Position (default is = 'rightTop').

field.name: jfCameraLoaderOpacity
field.label: Loader Opacity
field.description: Choose Loader Opacity (default is = '80%').

field.name: jfCameraLoaderPadding
field.label: Loader Padding
field.description: Type Loader Padding (default is = '2').

field.name: jfCameraLoaderStroke
field.label: Loader Stroke
field.description: Type the thickness both of the pie loader and of the bar loader. Remember: for the pie, the loader thickness must be less than a half of the pie diameter (default is = '7').

field.name: jfCameraPauseOnHover
field.label: Pause On Hover
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Pause On Hover.

field.name: jfCameraPlayPause
field.label: Play / Pause
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Play / Pause Buttons.

field.name: jfCameraPauseOnClick
field.label: Pause On Click
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Pause On Click.

field.name: jfCameraNav
field.label: Direct Navigation
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Direct Navigation.

field.name: jfCameraNavH
field.label: Navigation Hover
field.description: if true the navigation button (prev, next and play/stop buttons) will be visible on hover state only, if false they will be visible always.

field.name: jfCameraMobileNavH
field.label: Mobile Navigation Hover
field.description: For Mobile Devices - if true the navigation button (prev, next and play/stop buttons) will be visible on hover state only, if false they will be visible always.

field.name: jfCameraPag
field.label: Pagination
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Pagination.

field.name: jfCameraThumbs
field.label: Thumbnails
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Thumbnails.

field.name: jfCamera_loadjquery
field.label: jQuery
field.description: If you dont use jQuery library on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' joomla template, you don't need to enable it.)

field.name: jfCamera_loadjquery_noconflict
field.label: jQuery noConflict Mode
field.description: If you dont use jQuery 'noConflict' mode on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' joomla template, you don't need to enable it.)

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1
field.label: Slide #1 / Image
field.description: Choose Image.

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_thumb
field.label: Slide #1 / Thumb
field.description: Choose Thumb Image.

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_title
field.label: Caption Title
field.description: Type Caption Title (Leave it empty if you dont want to have caption)

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_descr
field.label: Caption Description
field.description: Type Caption Description (Leave it empty if you dont want to have caption)

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_btn_text
field.label: Caption Button Text
field.description: Type Caption Button Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to have a button)

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_btn_link
field.label: Caption Button Link
field.description: Type Caption Button Link (Leave it empty if you dont want to have link)

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_btn_target
field.label: Caption Button Target
field.description: Choose Caption Button Target (default is '_blank')

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_effect
field.label: Caption Effect
field.description: Choose Caption Effect

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_posT
field.label: Caption Top Position
field.description: Type Caption Distance From Top (default is 'auto')

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_posL
field.label: Caption Left Position
field.description: Type Caption Distance From Left (default is '30px')

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_posB
field.label: Caption Bottom Position
field.description: Type Caption Distance From Bottom (default is '30px')

field.name: jfcamera_slide_1_caption_posR
field.label: Caption Right Position
field.description: Type Caption Distance From Right (default is 'auto')

field.description: Choose Caption Effect

field.name: jfcamera_slide_2_caption_posT

field.description: Type Caption Distance From Top (default is 'auto')

field.label: Caption Bottom Position
